subject: Investing
title: Echo Chambers and Investment Forums
description: A short lesson to help you apply Echo Chambers and Investment Forums.

hook.text: An online forum convinced thousands that one stock was 'guaranteed' to moon. It crashed 90% instead.

buildup.text: Echo chambers form when people with the same opinion reinforce each other and ban dissenting voices.

discovery.text: Inside the bubble, risks are minimized, rewards are exaggerated, and groupthink replaces analysis.

twist.text: The louder a community's conviction, the more likely the thesis is already priced inâ€”or wrong.

climax.text: Seek out communities that welcome debate and challenge assumptions rather than silence critics.

punchline.text: If everyone in the room agrees, you're in an echo chamber, not a strategy session.

quiz.question: What is the danger of investment echo chambers?
